{{menutrail|Main menu|New game menu|Class selection menu}} [[File:EpisodeSelection.png|thumb|The episode selection menu in [[Heretic]].]]The '''episode selection menu''' is displayed when starting a new game if there are more than one episode declared in [[MAPINFO]]. Its [[MENUDEF]] name is <tt>EpisodeMenu</tt>.
It is the second [[new game menu]], following the [[class selection menu]] and followed by the [[skill selection menu]]. [[Category:Menus]]
